name: Capitalist Alchemist
description:
Become Rich and Undying Do you like making money?

Good.

Do you like to live?

If you answered yes, also good.

Welcome to your shed, where you have to work your way up from being a poor Alchemist that only knows how to produce steel to a rich Alchemist who can breathe fire and live forever!

Find the right recipes, save them in your book and make money by choosing the best recipe. However, you can only consider the game won, once you have successfully brewed the Potion Of Eternal Life, for which the recipe is saved from the start. The difficult bit is getting there.

Still, this is no easy game. You will need to experiment a lot, and quite a few combinations will not work out the way you might have planned. That is the unstable element of Alchemy.

The controls are simple: you only need your mouse. Everything else will be explained in the all-knowing book!

Don't forget to leave a comment, especially if you have done the speedrun-mode (also include a screenshot as proof of validity :smirk:).

Thank you for playing this game!
